channel.title: [Pi] How do I add things?
channel.description:
Check this out http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/350889-667-maps-lands-idx-file.html
I have no idea how to add Models Maps or anything to a cache. Do you just simply copy and paste the files and your done or is there something else behind it? I also downloaded nex maps but I do not know how to add :( Please help!

item.title: [Pi] How do I add things?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

You will have to pack them into the cache. The most notorious, and my all-time favorite tool for doing so is Tom’s Cache Suite.

There are plenty of guides out there on how to use it. You have to repack the map indexes with your own.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] How do I add things?
item.dc:creator: @TormentedSoul TormentedSoul
item.description:
@TormentedSoul wrote:

Do you know any tutorials on adding maps and objects to a cache?

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] How do I add things?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Of course. That’s like buying a video card for your computer. There is a lot of work involved in the process of properly added it. Unfortunately, I do not do much client work, sorry.

Read full topic
